# ===============================
# Python + Conda Project .gitignore
# ===============================

# --- Python cache files ---
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# --- Jupyter Notebook checkpoints ---
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# --- Virtual environments ---
.env
.venv
env/
venv/
ENV/
env.bak/
venv.bak/

# --- Conda environment folders ---
.conda/
conda-meta/
*.conda
*.yaml

# --- IDE/Editor files ---
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace

# --- OS-generated files ---
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini

# --- Logs and temporary files ---
*.log
*.out
*.bak
*.tmp

# --- Unit test / coverage reports ---
htmlcov/
.tox/
.nox/
.coverage
*.cover
coverage.xml
*.py,cover

# --- Distribution / packaging ---
build/
develop-eggs/
dist/
downloads/
eggs/
.eggs/
lib/
lib64/
parts/
sdist/
var/
*.egg-info/
.installed.cfg
*.egg

# --- Data and model files (optional) ---
data/
datasets/
models/
outputs/
results/
checkpoints/
*.h5
*.pkl
*.joblib
*.ckpt

# --- Notebooks and analysis exports ---
*.nbconvert.ipynb
*.pdf

# --- Temporary notebooks ---
temp_*.ipynb
test_*.ipynb

# --- Jupyter runtime ---
profile_default/
ipython_config.py

# --- Spyder project settings ---
.spyderproject
.spyproject

# --- PyCharm project settings ---
.idea/

# --- PyInstaller ---
*.manifest
*.spec

# --- Pyre type checker ---
.pyre/

# --- mypy type checker ---
.mypy_cache/
.dmypy.json
dmypy.json

# --- Local scripts or secrets ---
secrets.*
config.json
*.env
token.txt
api_keys.txt

# --- Backup files ---
*~
*.swp
*.swo
*.bak

# Ignore local environment
env/
venv/
.venv/
